price: 26. Entonces (Abraham) se dirigió con rapidez hacia su familia y regresó con un buen ternero asado.
arabic: فَرَاغَ إِلَىٰٓ أَهۡلِهِۦ فَجَآءَ بِعِجۡلٖ سَمِينٖ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish. published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: farāgha ilā ahlihi fajāa biʿij'lin samīnin
